title.narrative: CSF_Support till nationella och lokala policyer för klimatförändringar
CSF_Support to National and local Climate Change Policies

description.narrative:
This proposal seeks to contribute to the national and departmental public policies to combat climate change, based on a joint collaboration with academia, civil society and the public sector. The aim is to support efforts to reduce deforestation and CO2eq emissions up to the years 2030 and 2050. To achieve this main objective, three specific objectives have been established: - Objective 1: To support the design of a Deforestation Reduction and Mitigation Strategy at the national level, based on the generation of a Roadmap to achieve the goals of the Forestry and Agricultural sectors established in the NDC of the Plurinational State of Bolivia 2021-2030 - Objective 2: To analyse, assess and design at least one financial mechanism to improve the generation of own income for the National Authority of Protected Areas SERNAP -Objective 3: To analyse the economic impact associated with the implementation of the measures identified in the Climate Change Departmental Strategy developed by the Departmental Government of Santa Cruz, hereinafter called Departmentally Determined Contributions (CDD), identifying i) their cost-efficiency, ii) the cost associated with their implementation, iii) their impact on macroeconomic performance at the departmental, and iv) the comparison of the macroeconomic projection with respect to a baseline scenario (without EDCC).
At the end of the intervention is expected: -The establishment of a Roadmap to reduce and mitigate deforestation in Bolivia, in such a way that it is viable and applicable within the terms established in the updated NDC (and its goals until the year 2030), outlining actions and goals that contribute to achieving the sectoral measures defined for the Forestry and Agricultural sectors. - The design of at least one new financing mechanism for SERNPAC, based on reliable technical information, and the roadmap for its implementation and inclusion in SERNAPs Collection System. - A report that will contain the results of the model simulations that show the macroeconomic effects and the financial needs of the implementation of key climate change mitigation policies in the department of Santa Cruz (aimed at reducing CO2eq emissions in accordance with the CDDs, Bolivian´s NDC and the objectives of CO2eq emissions by 2050). In a complementary and descriptive way, it is planned to identify and analyse the gender implications that the proposed policies may have.
